definition: tool consisting of a combination of implements arranged to work together, act as an organized group
details:
noun
- tool consisting of a combination of implements arranged to work together
- an organized group of workmen
= synonyms: crew, work party
- an association of criminals
= example: an association of criminals
= synonyms: ring
- an informal body of friends
= synonyms: bunch, crowd, crew
verb
- act as an organized group
= synonyms: gang up
